item.description:
Alina, a member of our MeetUp group would like to invite all members (even those that she has not yet met) to her Graduation and Bon Voyage social. Please attend! She will be moving back to San Diego later this month. Details on the event:

Date: Wednesday, October 22nd
Time: 9pm to 11pm
(light jazz will begin at 10pm)

Location:
Tisane Tea & Coffee Bar
537 Farmington Ave
Hartford, CT 06105
Phone: (860) 523-5417

Alina's Cell Number: (619) 933-9277

Parking: If you do not park appropriately, you will be towed.
Please carefully review parking signs. If the lot is full, you may park on the street or in the overflow lot (spots marked with yellow brick behind the Kinkos across the street).

All are welcome!
item.how_to_find_us: It's a small place so it won't be difficult

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: Alina's going away party
